recipe.title: Jasmines Ice Coffee
recipe.ingredient: ( alternative dissolve 1 teasp instant coffee with 1/4 cup boiling water, then cool)
1 teaspoon fresh whipped cream or double cream
recipe.step: In a tall glass pour in coffee. Carefully put in ice cubes, then ice cream into the glass. Pour in enough milk to almost reach the top. Gently scoop the cream on top and sprinkle decoratively with a pinch of cocoa (cocoa can be replaced with chocolate powder), serve with a long spoon!
